subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees rallied from a 5-1 deficit, but A. J. Pierzynski’s two-run double was the decisive blow in the seventh, a half inning after Curtis Granderson left with an injury.
snippet: The Yankees rallied from a 5-1 deficit, but A. J. Pierzynski’s two-run double was the decisive blow in the seventh, a half inning after Curtis Granderson left with an injury.
